strings.v: You couldn't join this battlegroup as it is full.
The Battlegroup you are attempting to join has become full. You must select a new one to join.
This group is inactive for this war.
This Alliance Quest is split into {0} Battlegroups.
Join the fight! The war ends in {0}
Place your defenders! The war starts in {0}

This event requires a team size of {0}.

To unlock team slots, you need to level up by gaining more XP.
You do not have enough Champions to join this event.
You must join the Battlegroup that your defenders are placed in.
This group will unlock once the previous group has {0} members.
This group will unlock once the previous group has 1 member.
You are only allowed to participate in one Alliance War at a time.
The maximum alliance members for this war have been reached. Please wait for the next war!
To participate, each player must join the Alliance before matchmaking begins.
If you join a Battlegroup in Placement phase, you must join that one for Attack phase.
The best chance for victory comes from filling up a Battlegroup completely.
Defenders cannot attack, so be sure to balance your team.
Defenders and Attackers in the war won't be able to explore any other quests.

Players may only move or swap their own Champions.
However, leader and officers may move any Champions.
The Leader and Officers can swap any Champions to form strategy.
Spectate before selecting a team to make a plan.
Strategize with your Alliance to take out the final boss.
See 'Rewards' to view your prizes and claim them from the stash.
See 'Overview' to view a detailed breakdown of your Alliance performance.
Rewards are available from the stash once the War is over.
Earn full rewards by meeting the target exploration %.
Go face to face with another Alliance for great rewards and glory!
The Leader and Officers can enter matchmaking to find an Alliance to go to war with. It may take some time to find a fair match.
Alliance members are split into Battlegroups. Select a Battlegroup carefully; you can't change once you choose one!
Select a team of Champions to defend your Battlerealm!
Select a team of Champions to attack the enemy's Battlerealm!
View War Results to see what the outcome was.
Earn great rewards for your Alliance
Tap on your Champion to select it, then tap on an empty tile to place it.
Tap on your Champion to select it, then tap on an empty tile or tiles occupied by your Champion to swap. Alliance leadership can swap Champions as they please.
Tap on a Boost icon to learn about the tile's effects.

Place Champions on tiles with Hidden Information to hide their strength!

View Hidden tile info by tapping on the Boost icon.

Tap on the 'Eye' icon to see hidden information for all Defenders.
All Champions that are not placed when Attack phase starts will be placed automatically.
You cannot participate in this Alliance War because you joined the Alliance after it started.
The more Battlegroups that participate the greater the rewards!
Alliance Wars pit your Alliance against another for glory and great rewards!
Rewards are revealed once a match is found.
There are no Alliance Wars at this time. Please check back later.
The percentage of the possible defenders that have been placed.
Current points earned from War performance.
This feature has been temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Your War data is out of sync. Please try again.
This feature has been temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Leadership has not started matchmaking yet.
Your Alliance is ready to find a match!
Are you sure you want to stop searching? It may take an hour or more to find a fair match, and cancelling will remove you from the queue.
Only the Leader and Officers may move other members' Champions.
Placement phase is nearly over! Please wait for the war to start.
The rewards shown are the potential maximum rewards. Earn the maximum rewards by reaching the Exploration value shown for each reward type!
Participate in other modes or move your Defenders while you wait for the War to start.
As a Leader or Officer, you can swap the placement of any Defenders.
Tap your Champion to select it, then tap on an empty tile to place it.
Completion is the exploration percentage of all battlegroups in the war
This Alliance War has ended. Please wait for the next one to start.
The war will end soon. Please wait for the next one to start.
Your War Rating is affected by winning or losing a war.
YOUR REMAINING CHAMPIONS WILL BE AUTO PLACED.
Alliance rewards are sent to the Treasury when the war is over.
Your Alliance is in the top reward tier. Continue winning Alliance Wars to stay there!
Your rewards have been sent to the stash. Claim them now!
Unlock full rewards by exploring more of the enemy's map in Attack phase!
Member rewards are sent to the stash when the war is over.
Check your stash for unclaimed rewards!
Your Alliance Treasury does not have the required resources.
Leadership has not started the quest yet.

This event is ending soon and you might not be able to complete the quest.

Are you sure you want to start?
There are no active Alliance Quests at this time. Please check back later.
There are no completed Alliance Events at this time. Come back to see results and collect rewards when an Alliance Event closes.
This Alliance Quest has ended. Please wait for the next one to start.
This Alliance Quest will expire soon. Please wait for the next one to start.
Congratulations! See how your Alliance did.
The Leader and Officers can start a quest. Donate to the Alliance Treasury to help pay the starting cost!
Alliance members are split into Battlegroups. Select a Battlegroup carefully; you can't change once you choose one!
Battle enemies to earn points for your Alliance. Defeat special enemies to remove boosts from other enemies!
Earn as many points as you can! Compete against other Alliances for rank rewards at the end of the event.
Co-operate with your Alliance on a quest! Use strategy and fight to earn score for fantastic rewards!
Visit the Glory Store for rare Upgrade Items!

Recalling returns you to the beginning of the quest.

Are you sure you want to recall?
You have run out of recall.
Contribution relative to others, increased through contributing to win conditions.
Contribution points are earned through dealing damage.
Check advanced "how to play" to get more details.
You are only allowed to participate in one Alliance War at a time.
You are only allowed to participate in one Alliance Quest at a time.
You cannot participate in this Alliance Quest because you joined the Alliance after it started.
Champions in your team are now being used in an Alliance War.
Champions in your team are now being used in an Alliance Quest.
This Champion is already being used in an Alliance War.
